actions.text: On agreeing to the Rohrabacher amendment (A044) Agreed to by recorded vote: 225 - 190 (Roll no. 178).
Mr. Serrano demanded a separate vote on the Rohrabacher amendment (A044).
On agreeing to the Rohrabacher amendment (A044) Agreed to by recorded vote: 244 - 184 (Roll no. 200).

description: Amendment prohibits foreign assistance from being made available for the Russian Federation if that Federation transfers an SS-N-22 missile system to the People's Republic of China.
purpose: An amendment to prohibit funds made available under the Foreign assistance Act for fiscal years 1998 and 1999 for the Russian Federation if that country transfers an SS-N-22 missile system to the People's Republic of China.
